attributes.action: Make ALL Sport Sponsorship 100% Tax Deductible For UK Companies
attributes.additional_details:
Currently in the UK there is very little incentive for companies to sponsor any type of sport, While the 2012 Olympics has increased interest in sponsorship many other sports are falling behind in the sponsorship stakes.

This petition is to highlight to the Government that UK companies want to sponsor UK talent but need  incentives from financial sector to be able to do this.

Sponsorship creates jobs and increase's UK talent what more could a Government want to achieve
